text:
A 55-year-old woman was killed and three schoolgirls injured after they were knocked down by a passenger bus here in Denkanikottai on Wednesday.

The accident occurred after a lorry laden with stones hit the rear

of a bus that had halted to drop off passengers near Anjetti.

In the impact, the bus moved forward fatally knocking down pedestrian Rathinamma.

Three schoolgirls Roja (12), Uma (17) and Mamtha (16) were severely injured.
title: One killed, three injured in accident
